title: Aardman, NFTS & Creative Skillset launch 2015 Animation Course (Aardman Animations Ltd)
text: ( Source : Aardman Animations Ltd) Aardman Academy , the training arm to the world renowned animation studio, is delighted to announce that their annual Certificate in Character Animation course for 2015 has begun, training a selection of
